name: exa-mcp-server
description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server lets AI assistants like Claude use the Exa AI Search API for web searches. This setup allows AI models to get real-time web information in a safe and controlled way.

tools.name: web_search
tools.description: Search the web using Exa AI - performs real-time web searches and can scrape content from specific URLs. Supports configurable result counts and returns the content from the most relevant websites.

numResults.description: Number of search results to return (default: 5)

prompts.name: Web Search
prompts.description: Search for recent developments in quantum computing
prompts.text: Can you search for recent developments in quantum computing?

prompts.name: News Search
prompts.description: Search for and summarize news about AI startups
prompts.text: Search for and summarize the latest news about artificial intelligence startups in new york.

prompts.name: Research Paper Search
prompts.description: Find research papers about climate change
prompts.text: Find and analyze recent research papers about climate change solutions.

prompts.name: Twitter Search
